name: Bicycle
description: Client (F/62) is engaging two part-time jobs. She is the breadwinner of herself and her husband. Hence, she is seeking for a bicycle for travel convenience and to reduce transport cost. She also hopes to use the bicycle to run errands around the neighbourhood.

name: Malay Karaoke VCDs / DVDs
description: Our senior centre has a weekly karaoke session dedicated to Malay and English songs. While we have a good collection of English discs, we only have a few Malay discs. Hence we are looking for donation of discs to boost our Malay collection. Many Thanks.

contact.org: Moral Senior Activity Center @ Kaki Bukit
contact.name: Gary Tan

name: Bicycle for 8-Years-Old
description: Low-income family wishes to fulfil their son's request to have a bicycle. Son has not learned to ride a bicycle. Hence, would prefer a bicycle with detachable training wheels, suitable for 8-years-old. Thank you!

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Choa Chu Kang
contact.name: Rachel Tan

name: Bicycle (for 13 - 15 year old boy)
description: Please WhatsApp Social Worker Seelvi at 8699 3152 or email to Seelvi.Nadarasan@thkmc.org.sg to liaise. Low income family with young children is seeking support for bicycle (for 13 - 15 year old boy). Client & his wife are not working currently due to medical conditions.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

name: Bicycle
description: Family of 2 school-going children of age 14 and 16. It is a single-parent family with the parent working part-time. The family hopes to have a bicycle so they can save on transport costs. To add on, the bicycle needs to be able to hold a relatively heavy weight as one family member is bigger in size.

name: Drypers Wee Wee Dry Diapers - L (9 - 14kg)
description: Client is diagnosed with Stage 4 Liver CA and has poor prognosis. Family is financially needy and rely heavily on financial and other support. Client has children who consumes formula milk and requires diapers.

name: Friso Gold Wheat Cereal
description: Client is diagnosed with Stage 4 Liver CA and has poor prognosis. Family is financially needy and rely heavily on financial and other support. Client has children who consumes formula milk and requires diapers.

name: Lactogen Stage 3
description:
Client is a single mother with 4 young children under the age of 6. As her husband is incarcerated, Client is the main caregiver of the children and is unable to work to supplement the family income. As the younger children are awaiting childcare placement, Client would appreciate milk powder support for her youngest son. 

Lactogen Stage 3

name: MamyPoko Pants Extra Dry Skin, Boys (8 packs)
description: This is a low income family of 4 with a child with special needs and another school going child. Father is the sole breadwinner of the family. Mother is the main caregiver to the child with special needs who requires support in most activities of his daily living. The child requires daily use of a few diapers and the total cost of it can add up to a significant amount so it has been difficult for the family to build savings.

name: Pampers Diaper Premium Care Pants
description: Family has 3 young children, ages 7,4 and a 5mth infant. Family is facing financial difficulty as father is the sole breadwinner earning $1800/monthly as a forklift operator. Mother is unable to work as she has to take care of newborn as well as her 2 older children. They have recently moved into HDB rental flat. This donation will help the family greatly in defraying some of their grocery costs.

name: Similac Stage 2 Milk Powder
description: Low income family requires Similac Stage 2 Milk Powder for their young child. Help for the family is greatly appreciated. Thank you.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Nur Batrisyia

name: Dumex Dulgro Stage 3 Milk Powder
description: Family has 4 young children including 1 newborn. Family is low income and struggling to find means to care for children. Father is sole breadwinner doing food delivery work. Mother is unable to work currently due to health concerns and has just given birth to her fourth child. Milk powder will help the family provide for their children's basic needs.
